action_details:
Given that we need a hospital with sufficient capacity and proximity to the incident location, Hospital Universitario Puerta del Mar appears to be the best choice. It has an available bed capacity of 25 and is located at: 
* Latitude: 36.509153
* Longitude: -6.277911
This hospital specializes in Trauma, Cardiology, and Neurology, making it well-equipped to handle emergency cases.
